fields.description: The date and time when this password was last updated. This property is currently not populated. Read-only. The Timestamp type represents date and time information using ISO 8601 format and is always in UTC time. For example, midnight UTC on Jan 1, 2014 is 2014-01-01T00:00:00Z.
fields.name: CreatedDateTime

fields.description: For security, the password is always returned as null from a LIST or GET operation.
fields.name: Password
